extendedInfo.description: Every month, the IRS provides various prescribed rates known as Applicable Federal Rates for use in connection with various provisions of the Internal Revenue Code. The CCH Applicable Federal Rates 2013 mobile application provides these rates in a handy, easy-to-use tool for tax practitioners. AFRs are computed as provided in IRC Sec. 1274(d) on the basis of the average market yield on outstanding marketable short-term, mid-term, and long-term obligations of the United States.
